sentences: Gabriel Ananda (born in Bad Driburg, Germany) is a German DJ and producer of techno music.
Ananda was interested in music at an early age, but it wasn't until 1995 when he experienced a live set by Sven Väth he got interested in electronic music.
Ananda made his debut as a producer as half of the duo Da Hairy Belafontes on the label Hörspielmusik, with the three-track EP 'Daylight Comes and We Don't Want to Go Home' in 1998.
His 2004 release of "Süssholz" went to the top of the German DJ charts.
